name: disband
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to stop being a group: She formed a political group which disbanded a year later.

Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a group) to stop existing, or to cause a group to stop existing: [ T ] The managers planned to disband the team.
Add to word list
Add to word list
to stop existing as a group or organization, or to end a group or organization: The international department was disbanded due to budget cuts.
